lead_paragraph: EVANS--John C. The Directors and Staff of the Henry Luce Foundation mourn the passing of our distinguished colleague and friend who served loyally on the Foundation's Board from 1977 to 2011. A champion of education and the arts, he will be remembered for his wise counsel and devotion to the Foundation's mission. We extend our deepest sympathy to his children Wendy, Nancy and John and their families. Margaret Boles Fitzgerald, Chair Michael Gilligan, President 1/3
